article.title: Rockwell to Provide Radio Equipment
article.author: George Seffers
article.text:
Rockwell Collins Incorporated, Cedar Rapids, Iowa, is being awarded a $13,919,215 contract option for AN/ARC-210(V) electronic radio and ancillary equipment for the Air Force. The option provides for the following quantities: (50) C-12719/ARC control, radio set, (50) AM-7526/ARC high power amplifier, (50) MX-11641/ARC LNA diplexer and (135) RT-1939(C)/ARC receiver-transmitter. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md. is the contracting activity.
